description: Creates or updates a deployment parameter and is targeted by catalog and agreementId.

parameters.name: agreementId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog related to the request. Fixed value: AWSMarketplace.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token for deployment parameters. A unique identifier for the new version. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: deploymentParameter
parameters.description: The deployment parameter targeted to the acceptor of an agreement for which to create the AWS Secret Manager resource. The desired name of the deployment parameter. This is the identifier on which deployment parameters are keyed for a given buyer and product. If this name matches an existing deployment parameter, this request will update the existing resource. The text to encrypt and store in the secret.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The desired name of the deployment parameter. This is the identifier on which deployment parameters are keyed for a given buyer and product. If this name matches an existing deployment parameter, this request will update the existing resource.

nested_params.name: secretString
nested_params.description: The text to encrypt and store in the secret.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The product for which AWS Marketplace will save secrets for the buyer's account.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of key-value pairs, where each pair represents a tag saved to the resource. Tags will only be applied for create operations, and they'll be ignored if the resource already exists. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: agreementId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

nested_items.name: deploymentParameterId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the deployment parameter.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the deployment parameter resource you want to create or update.
